
### linking 

![](texfig/dl-primer-linking.figure.svg)


### static v. dynamic linking 


* static linking --- linking <em>to create executable</em>
* dynamic linking --- linking <em>when executable is run</em> 

* conceptually: no difference in how they work
* reality --- very different mechanisms


### linking data structures 


* symbol table: <code>name</code> $\\Rightarrow{}$ (section, offset) 

   * example: <code>main:</code> in assembly adds symbol table entry for <code>main</code>

* relocation table: offset $\\Rightarrow{}$ (name, kind) 

   * example: <code>call printf</code> adds relocation for name <code>printf</code>
   * kind depends on how instruction encodes address
